metadata.title: CVE-2019-13445 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the ROS communications-related packages (akaros_comm or ros-melodic-ros-comm) through 1.14.3. parseOptions() intools/rosbag/src/record.cpp has an integer overflow when a crafted splitoption can be entered on the command line.

criterions.comment: ros-ros-comm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
